headline: US rig count up one as prices climb
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was unchanged this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 244 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 298 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up one from last week at 544 rigs. A year ago, 576 rigs were active. The count shows that 411 rigs sought oil, up one from the previous week, and 122 explored for ...

content.title: US rig count up one as prices climb
content.summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was unchanged this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 244 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 298 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up one from last week at 544 rigs. A year ago, 576 rigs were active. The count shows that 411 rigs sought oil, up one from the previous week, and 122 explored for ...

headline: US Pushes for Quickest Fixes to Boost Venezuela Oil Output
summary: Oilfield contractors such as SLB Ltd., Baker Hughes Co. and Halliburton Co. would focus their initial efforts on repairing or replacing damaged or outdated equipment and refreshing older drilling sites, according to senior administration officials who asked not to be identified discussing internal plans.  The idea is that with limited investment, Venezuela could boost production by several hundred thousand barrels over the short term, the people said.  The go-fast approach is designed to fulfill the Trump administration’s goal of swiftly increasing crude flows in the wake of the US capture of Venezuelan strongman Nicolas Maduro, generating cash that could be used to help pay for rebuilding the country.
